extendedInfo.description: Are IBS Symptoms Ruling Your Entire Life?Do You Want The Digestive System You Were Born With Back?Heal Irritable Bowel Syndrome The Natural Way!Stop Making Things Worse By Using Dangerous Prescription and Over-The-Counter Drugs?Have you become paralyzed by the symptoms of Irritable Bowel Syndrome?Are you weary of the nausea, cramps, bloating, gas, constipation and sexual fears caused by this uncomfortable yet very common condition?Do you want to avoid taking the pain relievers, anti-spasmodics and anti-depressants prescribed for IBS because you do not like the unpleasant side effects such as weight gain, mood swings, dental decay and more?Then you need to download the:"Cure Irritable Bowel Syndrome" AppDeal with your symptoms by making just a few simple changes to your diet and lifestyle!Stop Avoiding Life Because of IBS... Feel Better Within Days!The "Cure Irritable Bowel Syndrome" App includes the Curing Irritable Bowel Syndrome eBook to get you the latest information about Curing Irritable Bowel Syndrome.Included in the Cure Irritable Bowel Syndrome App you'll find:IntroductionWhat is Irritable Bowel Syndrome?What are the most common symptoms?Initial diagnosisTesting for IBSQuestions to askâ¦How does Western medicine treat irritable bowel syndrome?Medicines for diarrheaMedicines for constipationFor cramping and painDrugs for mental difficultiesThe bottom line isâ¦Approaching irritable bowel syndrome a bit more than holisticallyâ¦Controlling irritable bowel syndrome through dietSoluble fiber foodsInsoluble fiber foods are necessary too, butâ¦The âgo there at your perilâ or triggers listâ¦Final dietary thoughtsâ¦Stress management is criticalWhy you must get a good nightâs sleepâ¦Yoga, meditation and deep breathingâ¦Hypnotherapy for overcoming IBSâ¦I canât emphasize enoughâ¦What does traditional Chinese medicine tell us about IBS?Supplements and herbs for IBSSupplementsHerbs for irritable bowel syndromeConclusion
